https://tmrev.io/movie/782516-2nd Hand Cinema 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sIJTHRppR6DpmTpmMrhrrsHtSZA.jpg A celebration of the offal of cinema, old films, old soundtracks, drawing directly on the film, using stamps and food-dyes to create discarded imagery. To chew film up and spit it out as painting direct. 2nd Hand Cinema
